feedback.title: Add the attachment capability to Measurement
Add workflow to Django-phython application
feedback.text: Artem did an excellent job in understanding the requirements and provided me exactly what was required. I would definitely recommend working with Artem!

feedback.title: Django proof-of-concept site.
feedback.text: Artyom completed work exceeding expectations. He not only build Django site as required but he also advised me about number of ideas and best practices. He is Django, Python and JavaScript expert. He was the best freelancer I have ever worked with. He is competent, knowledgable, helpful. He was always ahead of schedule.

feedback.title: Telegram Group Manager Chat Moderation & Notification Bot
feedback.text: Rare gem. I'm telling you, freelancers like Artyom are hard to find. Honest man and Good coder. His English is awesome, he always comes with solutions, he replies fast, he doesn't lie, he respected the terms of our deal and did not ask for more money *like 9/10 freelancers do. Thank you so much Artyom!

feedback.text: Job was completed successfully. I liked working with Artyom and might work again in the future

feedback.text: Excellent work, deep knowledge of the subject and excellent communication. Highly recommend!
